collections.description: All natural dog treats and chews for your furry friend
collections.conditions: Product title contains: 'yak chews' OR 'bully stick' OR 'pig ears' OR 'dog bone' OR 'chews'

collections.description: Slow feeder bowls and feeding accessories
Collars, raincoats, and other dog accessories

notes.rationale: Simple 3-collection structure that covers all product categories without redundancy. Each collection groups related products logically.
notes.setup_priority: Start with these 3 collections. You can always add more specific collections later if needed as your product catalog grows.
